title: LOL Freezes Computer
body:
So, while I play league I enjoy having spotify and skype running, and steam. Before the most recent windows 10 update, everything worked fine. Now, when I load in with these three running, my computer freezes, and requires a complete power down to work again.

These are my system specs: 
Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-5200 CPU @ 2.20 GHz
System Type: 64-bit Operating system, x64-based processor

I have a hyper X cloud 2 headset, and a Zelotes Great Spider Inception mouse

Also, after I noticed this bug, I wiped my entire computer, and re-downloaded windows 10. This bug still persists, I could really use some help please and thank you =)

replies.body: The freezing issue has been happening to a few players, and caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) auto-enabling after a recent update.  Disabling that should get this fixed up!  Also good stuff, I have the same headset and love it!  :D
Thank you so much! I've noticed the bar and thought it was really cool, guess its just a hindrance =(
